ğŸ–‹ï¸ Customize Fonts on Selected Websites with Ease!. 2000+ fonts available

ğŸ”‘  Why you should consider this:
âœª Change font on selected websites.
âœª Change font of selected html tags or classes.
âœª 2000+ fonts available.
âœª Choose system (local) fonts to load faster and save bandwidth
âœª Don't ask "read and change all your data on add all websites" Permission.
âœª Change font size, letter spacing, line height , font weight & color
âœª Apply font any any websites (static & Dynamic) without FOUC issue
âœª Enable/Disable font rule in one click
âœª Upload custom font file
âœª Lightweight 30kb only
âœª 100% privacy-focused: no tracking, no ads
âœª Dark mode for a comfortable experience

ğŸ“Œ == FEATURES ==
Tired of default fonts while browsing? With FontSwapper, you can instantly personalize fonts on your favorite websites, offering over 2000+ fonts, including Google Fonts and system fonts, for faster loading and bandwidth savings. Whether it's adjusting font size, color, or spacing, FontSwapper puts you in control of your web reading experienceâ€”all with a lightweight, ad-free extension!

ğŸ”‘ Why Choose FontSwapper?

âœ… Change Fonts on Selected Websites: 
Customize font styles on specific sites for a more enjoyable reading experience.

âœ… Target Specific HTML Tags or Classes: Apply fonts only to certain elements, like headers or paragraphs.

âœ… 2000+ Fonts to Choose From: Access an extensive library of Google Fonts, or load system fonts for faster performance.

âœ… Custom Font Support: Upload your own font files for a truly unique look.
âœ… Adjust Font Size, Letter Spacing, Line Height & Color: Fine-tune text appearance to suit your preferences.

âœ… No Need for Full-Site Permissions: Unlike many extensions, FontSwapper doesn't require permission to read and change all data on every website.

âœ… Static & Dynamic Website Support: Apply font changes without the annoying Flash of Unstyled Content (FOUC).

âœ… Quick Enable/Disable: Toggle font rules on or off with a single click.

âœ… Lightweight & Fast: At only 30KB, FontSwapper wonâ€™t slow down your browsing.

âœ… No Tracking, No Ads: Enjoy a private, clutter-free experience with no hidden data tracking.

âœ… Dark Mode Support: Perfect for those late-night browsing sessions.

â„¹ï¸ Support 
Join fontSwapper on google groups: 
https://groups.google.com/g/fontswapper

You can mail us: webrailhelp@gmail.com
